title: Skew It on the Bar-B
text: "Skew It on the Bar-B" is the lead single released from <a href="OutKast">OutKast</a>'s 3rd studio album, "<a href="Aquemini">Aquemini</a>". The song features <a href="Raekwon">Raekwon</a>. It failed to chart on the <a href="Billboard%20Hot%20100">Billboard Hot 100</a>. The song features 3 verses, by <a href="Andr%C3%A9%203000">André 3000</a>, <a href="Raekwon">Raekwon</a>, and <a href="Big%20Boi">Big Boi</a>, in order. <a href="Organized%20Noize">Organized Noize</a> produced the song.
